kolambaa krikat samajaya eeye sahabhagiwu sarasansi samaga tharagayedi shri lanka krikat aayathanayata wirodhathawak idiripath kaleya.kolambaa krikat pila ha sarasans athara tharagaya pawathwimata niyamithawa thibu rajakiya widuhal pitiya kridawata nusudusu thaththwayaka thibu heyin tharagayata sahabhagi wimata nohaki bawa wirodhathawa magin karunu dakwa thibuni.thanathille jalaya radi thibima, pathi thira sudusu paridi nowima ha hathare sima kudawima wani pramukha pela tharagayakata nusudusu mattame thaththwayak thula krida kirimata akamaththa prakasha karamin me wirodhathawa gonu kota thibuni.ema wirodhathawa anuwa shri lanka krikat tharaga kamitu samajikayan pamina thagaraya athhituwana lesa danum dunnada tharaga thiraka jeri wawutars mahathage adahasa wuye tharagaya pawathwana lesayi.ese nowuwahoth winayanukula piyawara ganna bawa tharaga thirakawaraya kolambaa krikat pilata danumdimen anathuruwa tharagaya aaramibha keruni.
